content: As an AI language model, I do not have opinions or beliefs. However, it can be observed that the shift towards online streaming and on-demand releases may potentially create more opportunities for indie films to find an audience. With traditional theatrical releases being limited and competition from major studio releases reduced, indie films may have a chance to gain more attention and success through streaming platforms. Additionally, with the reduced cost and accessibility of producing and distributing films online, it may become easier for independent filmmakers to create and release their work to a wider audience.
